title: Peer Assessment-Based Learning Design Language Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate scientific knowledge and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment modeling peer assessment processes using simulation/VR tools in BYOD settings

learning_goals: Learners can express the learning design language for structuring peer assessment processes in three or more activity types
Learners can design and operate peer assessment scenarios in VR simulation environments and implement feedback loops
Learners can analyze operational meanings of learning design through an activity theory-based framework and verify technical feasibility
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
